name: Tito e os Pássaros
summary: The film tells the story of a boy who is responsible, along with his father, for finding the cure for an illness that is contracted after the person takes a fright.
info:
• 中文名: 提托与鸟儿们
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: Tito and the Birds
  • 上映年度: 2018-6-11
  • 片长: 73分钟
  • 官方网站: http://www.titoandthebirds.com
  • 动画制作: Bits Filmes
  • 语言: 葡萄牙语
